msbt.message: That reminds me! I have exciting news, .
Today, in honor of International Museum Day, we're holding a Stamp Rally!

It works thusly The bug, fish, and fossil galleries each have three stamp stations You must find the stations within each gallery and acquire the necessary stamps to earn a prize. You can earn three unique prizes, one for completing the rally in each of the three galleries! Hoo, it's true! Do be sure to give it a go whilst perusing the museum's many fine exhibits.
By the by, , we are still hosting a Stamp Rally here at the museum today.
You know, we are hosting a Stamp Rally today as well.

The stamp stations change each day, you see.That way the rally remains a fresh challenge even for those who've already given it a go. Now, the prizes do remain the same. Still, you can win additional copies by playing each new day. 'Tis quite a hoot! Do give it a try!
By the by, we are hosting a Stamp Rally today in honor of International Museum Day.

By my beak! You've finished the Stamp Rally in the bug exhibit!Your willingness to explore the bug rooms with such gusto isadmirable. I, myself, find lingering there quite impossible!Anyhoot, here is the prize that was promised!

Hoot! I say, hoo! Look at you! You've finished the Stamp Rally in the fish gallery!I say, did you happen to take any photographs of your quest?Your NookPhone takes marvelous photos. And the fish rooms make an elegant backdrop, to be sure. Wot wot?! Ah! Of course! Here's that prize you were promised.

My feathers! You've finished the Stamp Rally in the fossil gallery!As the host of these rallies, it pleases me to my pinfeathers to see you frolic amid the fossils so! Indeed, it is with great pride that I present you with the prize you were promised.
Eh wot?! Your pockets! They're stuffed to bursting.Come back once you've organized yourself, and I shall give you your reward.
That's more like it. Organizing one's pockets feels good, no? Now, here is that Stamp Rally prize you earned.
Jolly good. I shall now present you with the completion stamp.
Wot wot?! It seems you've already acquired the prize for the bug rally today,
I say! What's this? It appears you've already earned the prize for the fish rally today,
Say now, ! It looks as though you've already won the prize for the fossil rally today

Why, to think that you would join in, even though you'd already earned your reward! Truly, I am honored! Your dedication to and enthusiasm for museum exploration warm my downy heart. Alas, while I'd like nothing more than to give you another reward, they are limited in number each day. I'm afraid I can only present you with a completion stamp at this time.
Yes, a completion stamp is in order at this juncture. Hoot, here you go!
Now, should you find yourself exploring the other exhibit rooms, do try collecting stamps there. Someone such as yourself is sure to find it a worthy pursuit.

Hoot and wot wot?! You've collected all the stamps available today?To think you've enjoyed the Stamp Rally to such a degree! I can't help but puff my feathers with pride! I thank you, and I hope you continue to revel in all this museum has to offer.
